comments.text: ## 他们曾多次想摧毁我们。他们失败了。我们已经经历了这么多! 如果有人认为，在克服了这一切之后，乌克兰人会感到害怕、崩溃或投降，那么他对乌克兰一无所知。而且他在乌克兰也无事可做。回家去保护讲俄语的人吧。不是在全世界，而是在你自己的国家。

data.text:
## They wanted to destroy us so many times. They failed. We've been through so much! And if someone thinks that, having overcome all this, Ukrainians will be frightened, broken or surrender, he knows nothing about Ukraine. And he has nothing to do in Ukraine. Go home to protect Russian-speaking people. Not all over the world, but in your own country.

### Source: [Volodymyr Zelenskyy's Telegram Channel](https://t.me/V_Zelenskiy_official/768)

![](https://i.ibb.co/55L9Z8T/we-stand-with-ukraine-picjumbo-com.jpg)
